@safaaelbayed  Thank you

It is basically the same thing. pgh is the same as force over area. you know density is mass over volume so, usinng it in this equation, we know that density is m/v. Using the force force/area concept we can write p=mg/(v/h) which is the same thing as mg*h/v which is the same thing as p=mgh. This shows us that with either one you get the same result because they are literally the same thing.
Sorry, I meant which is the same thing as p=phg not mgh. Hope that was helpful
